name: Michelle CORRY, a minor, by her parents and natural guardians, Michael CORRY and Renee Corry, and Michael Corry and Renee Corry, in their own right, Appellants, v. Sister Elizabeth M. HART and Diocese of Allentown

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
LARSEN, J., dissents and would reverse on the basis of the dissent authored by POPOVICH, J., in this matter.
parties: Michelle CORRY, a minor, by her parents and natural guardians, Michael CORRY and Renee Corry, and Michael Corry and Renee Corry, in their own right, Appellants, v. Sister Elizabeth M. HART and Diocese of Allentown.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents and would reverse on the basis of the dissent authored by POPOVICH, J., in this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Allen L. Feingold, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Jerrold P. Anders, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
501 A.2d 248
Michelle CORRY, a minor, by her parents and natural guardians, Michael CORRY and Renee Corry, and Michael Corry and Renee Corry, in their own right, Appellants, v. Sister Elizabeth M. HART and Diocese of Allentown.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 2, 1985.
Decided Dec. 10, 1985.
Allen L. Feingold, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Jerrold P. Anders, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
